Articles.Content:
**(I have no idea where I should be posting this, so it's here now. Enjoy it.)**

Has anyone noticed that Kerbalizer has really changed. Not just in a good way, actually in a bad way. It's sort of reverted back to the free version (if you brought it recently, *like I had to due to yadda yadda, reasons*) even if you spent money.

So you spend a few quid, open it up and get the previously free version but now with bits missing and a lot more bugs! ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)

This is kinda terrible.

Moved this over to the Kerbal Network.

Sounds like something went wrong, hopefully one of the website people can get you squared away. You should drop an email to [\[email protected\]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#052032476a75716c6a6b203241) with the details of your purchase.

I never bought it because it lacks the ability to put your customized Kerbal in the game. Do that and I'd buy that for a dollar.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/u5HOt0ZOcYk?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-05T11:32:54Z" title="08/05/2015 11:32  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 5, 2015</time> by sal\_vager**

> 
> I never bought it because it lacks the ability to put your customized Kerbal in the game. Do that and I'd buy that for a dollar.
> 
> 
> 
> <iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/u5HOt0ZOcYk?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Shoot, for that ability I would pay up to ten dollars. 

I mean seriously, it would be an awesome feature to the game. Along with a general population of Kerbin. (Or at least visible workers besides in the VAB and SPH)

^ In-game custom Kerbals would be awesome but I wouldn't mind if they don't become a thing.

More on-topic: I have the paid version of the Kerbalizer (it's a useful drawing reference!) so I'll see if it's buggy for me too, soon. What browser are you using?

I just checked and I can clearly see the difference between the free and the pro version. Are you sure you're logged into the KSP store? [https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kerbalizer.php](https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kerbalizer.php) should prompt you to "Get pro" if you're not, and simply load the pro version when you are logged in.
